text: Rowing at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games logo Rowing at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games took place in the La Mesa Dam, Novaliches Reservoir, Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The event was held from November 28 to December 1. ==Medal winners== {| class="wikitable" !
